titles.title: Booker T. Washington National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2001
Booker T. Washington National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2001
Booker T. Washington National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2002
To expand the boundary of the Booker T. Washington National Monument, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 107-223.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 135.

action.text: Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1456.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman without amendment. With written report No. 107-199.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 476.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 9/28/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Booker T. Washington National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act of 2001 - Modifies the boundary of the Booker T. Washington National Monument in Franklin County, Virginia, to include specified additional lands.
